title: Mobile Outdoor Learning Program for Investigating Local Environmental Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Basic environmental science concepts and experience recognizing community issues
context.additional_context: Strengthening the ability of practicing language professionals to develop field-applicable educational content by solving community issues

learning_goals: Learners can collect and systematically analyze local socio-environmental issue data using mobile devices.
Learners can create multidimensional concept maps for socio-environmental issues based on field survey results.
Learners develop a prototype of actionable language education content for solving community problems.

resources: Environmental Data Measurement Sensors (Air Quality/Noise, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
